name: Phanpy
author: Ken Sugimori
flavor_text: As a sign of affection, it bumps with its snout. However, it is so strong, it may send you flying.

poke_body.name: Ultra-Thick Skin
poke_body.effect: As long as Phanpy has Energy attached to it, any damage done to Phanpy by attacks is reduced by 10 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Rock Smash
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 10 more damage.
